column5: A little candy for the boat guys getting cabin fever
I hope no carp were hurt in the making of this video...
60-80mph, video was from an allison and the other boats a hydrostream and stv?
Raw soft water music,  And yes, please be kind to the carp. My buddy likes them.
Im glad I wasnt on the river that day. Sheesh....  S
Ha any of these you....I always get a kick outa these guys when I'm fishing. The only question I have is how fast can you stop? there are some corners i'd rather not meet you on lol
Looks like a fun ride...Ill pass on the fuel bill though
Isn't the speed limit 10 Kph within 100 feet of shore ?
Gotta love a screaming 2 stroke at WOT though.
there 'was' two SVT's on 4 mile lake and man they could fly! you knew what one (white or yellow) was coming based on the sound. they raced all the time a two lap race around the lake.

there 'was' two SVT's on 4 mile lake and man they could fly! you knew what one (white or yellow) was coming based on the sound. they raced all the time a two lap race around the lake. 2 laps then out of gas no doubt....
~~~~Thanks for posting love the ride, going to watch it again
Im glad I wasnt on the river that day. Sheesh....  S You would be bothered a lot more by a 36' cabin barely on plane throwing a 3' wake, these boats barely throw one sinker.

Ha any of these you....I always get a kick outa these guys when I'm fishing. The only question I have is how fast can you stop? there are some corners i'd rather not meet you on lol  I did the video, these guys are very familiar with the river, they know when to slow down and how to run it.
